howItWorks.title: How to Use Block Blast Solver
howItWorks.description: Need help solving Block Blast puzzles? Our solver tool makes it super easy! Follow these simple steps to find the best moves.

step1.title: Set Up Your Board
step1.description: Click or drag on the main grid to show where blocks are currently placed on your game board (shown in green)

step2.title: Add Your Blocks
step2.description: Use the three small grids below to draw the shapes of your available blocks (shown in red, yellow, and blue)

step3.title: Get Solutions
step3.description: Click 'Calculate Optimal Solution' and watch as our solver shows you the best places to put each block

step4.title: See Results
step4.description: Follow the animated steps to see exactly where to place each block and which lines will be cleared

gameTips.title: Pro Tips for Block Blast Solver
gameTips.description: Make the most of our solver tool with these helpful tips!

faq.mainTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About Block Blast Solver
faq.description: Got questions about our Block Blast Solver? Find answers to common questions below!

whatIs.question: What is Block Blast Solver?
whatIs.answer: Block Blast Solver is a free online tool that helps you find the best moves in Block Blast! Just show us your current game board and available blocks, and our solver will calculate the optimal placement strategy for you.

howToPlay.question: How do I use the Block Blast Solver?
howToPlay.answer: It's super easy! First, click or drag on the main grid to show your current game board. Then, use the three small grids below to draw your available blocks. Click 'Calculate Optimal Solution' and watch as we show you the best moves step by step!

gameModes.question: Does the solver work for all game situations?
gameModes.answer: Yes! Our solver works for any Block Blast board layout and block combinations. It's especially helpful for tricky situations where you need to clear multiple lines or create combos.

offline.question: Can I use the solver offline?
offline.answer: Yes! Once you've loaded the Block Blast Solver page, it works completely offline. Perfect for using while you play, even without an internet connection!

highScore.question: How accurate is the solver?
highScore.answer: Our solver uses advanced algorithms to find the best possible moves for your current game state. It considers multiple factors like line clears, combos, and future block placement opportunities to suggest optimal solutions.

rewards.question: Will using the solver improve my game?
rewards.answer: Absolutely! By watching how the solver places blocks and creates combos, you'll learn better strategies and start recognizing optimal moves on your own. It's like having a Block Blast coach!

social.question: Is the solver regularly updated?
social.answer: Yes! We continuously improve our solver's algorithms and user interface based on player feedback. Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest improvements!

faq.needHelp: Still have questions about the Block Blast Solver?

blockBlastSolver.title: Block Blast Solver Instructions
blockBlastSolver.description: This is a tool to help you find the optimal solution in Block Blast game. Follow these steps:

steps.step1: Click or drag mouse to set initial blocks on the main board (shown in green)
steps.step2: Design your Figure shapes in the three small grids below (distinguished by red, yellow, and blue)
steps.step3: Click "Calculate Optimal Solution" to see placement suggestions

gameRules.title: Game Rules Tips:
rules: When 8 cells in the same row or column are filled, they will be automatically cleared
After clearing, other blocks remain in place (no gravity effect)
Three Figures can be placed in any order

interactions.clickOrDrag: Click or drag to set initial blocks
interactions.noValidPlacement: Current layout cannot place any Figure, please try another layout
interactions.continueDesigning: You can continue designing new Figures for the next round
